tuv.seg: Child welfare and protection services (including family support services) that were previously operated by the Health Service Executive have transferred to Tusla, which was established on 1 January 2014

Táthar tar éis seirbhísí leasa agus cosanta leanaí arbh í Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte a d’oibrigh iad roimhe seo (lena n-áirítear seirbhís tacaíochta teaghlaigh) a aistriú chuig Tusla a bunaíodh an 1 Eanáir 2014
The HSE may provide social work services for other groups or individuals
Is féidir leis an FSS seirbhísí oibre sóisialaí a sholáthar freisin do ghrúpaí nó daoine aonair eile
Social work services are delivered by teams of social workers, working with individuals and groups experiencing social and emotional difficulties
Seachadtar seirbhísí oibre sóisialaí ag foirne oibrithe sóisialacha, ag obair le daoine aonair agus le grúpaí a mbaineann deacrachtaí sóisialta agus mothúchánacha dóibh
The aim of social work is to help people achieve change and make decisions which will improve their quality of life
Tá sé mar aidhm ag an obair shóisialta cúnamh a chur ar fáil do dhaoine athrú a bhaint amach agus cinntí a dhéanamh a rachaidh chun leasa a gcáilíochta beatha
It is also a function of social work to identify options and support steps to advance social policy and service delivery
Tá ról freisin ag an obair shóisialta roghanna a aimsiú agus tacú le céimeanna le beartas sóisialta agus seachadadh seirbhíse a chur chun cinn
Most public hospitals employ social workers whose main task is to help people when they leave the hospital
Tá oibrithe sóisialta fostaithe ag formhór na n-ospidéal poiblí agus é mar phríomhdhualgas orthu cúnamh a thabhairt do dhaoine nuair a fhágann siad an t-ospidéal
They may find suitable accommodation for them, help them to find a nursing home place or ensure that the necessary supports are in place if they return home

D'fhéadfadh sé go n-aimseoidís cóiríocht oiriúnach dóibh, go gcuirfidís cúnamh ar fáil dóibh le háit i dteach altranais a aimsiú nó go gcinnteoidís go bhfuil na tacaíochtaí riachtanacha ar fáil má fhilleann siad abhaile
The availability of social workers varies considerably from one HSE area to another
Is mór an éagsúlacht d’ingfhaighteacht oibrithe sóisialacha idir limistéar amháin de chuid na FSS dá chéile
Some Local Health Offices employ social workers specifically to cater for the needs of older people
Tá oibrithe sóisialta fostaithe ag cuid de na hOifigí Sláinte Áitiúla le freastal ar riachtanais atá ag daoine níos sine
Social workers are registered by the Health and Social Care Professionals Council, CORU
Is leis an gComhairle um Ghairmithe Sláinte agus Cúraim Shóisialaigh, CORU, atá Oibrithe Sóisialacha cláraithe
The Irish Association of Social Workers is the the national body representing social workers
Is iad Cumann na hÉireann um Oibrithe Sóisialta an comhlacht náisiúnta a dhéanann ionadaíocht d’Oibrithe Sóisialta
For more information on social work, contact the Assocation at the address below (see 'Where to apply')
Chun teacht ar thuilleadh faisnéise ar obair shóisialta, déan teagmháil leis an gCumann ag an seoladh thíos
You can apply directly to your Local Health Office or hospital for assistance from a social worker
Féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh go díreach ar d’Oifig Áitiúil Sláinte nó ar d’ospidéal chun cúnamh a fháil ó oibrí sóisialta
